reviewText:
This "Mac Computer Class you can watch on TV" was designed and created by an experienced computer technologies instructor and life-long Mac user.

No technical jargon or advanced hacker stuff here.

This program is guaranteed to get the "Mac Computer Shy" viewer up and running with Apple's desktop email program in less than one hour.

Along the way, you'll also get additional info on Mac computer basics as Apple Mail seamlessly integrates with Safari, iCal, and Address Book.

Step-by-step instructions combined with colorful graphics and step-by-step instructions.

Thanks for reading this review and enjoy your new Mac buddy!
